articles.content: When the Covid-19 pandemic first struck in the United States, many alcohol distilleries stepped up and began producing hand sanitizer, a product that was desperately needed in both homes and hospital… [+2552 chars]

articles.content:

articles.title: Pfizer and BioNTech to offer COVID vaccine to volunteers who got placebo - KSL.com
